spec_data.Name: perl-POE-Component-Client-DNS
spec_data.Description:
POE::Component::Client::DNS provides a facility for non-blocking, concurrent
DNS requests. Using POE, it allows other tasks to run while waiting for name
servers to respond.

spec_data.Summary: Non-blocking/concurrent DNS queries using Net::DNS and POE
